cs.name: Savci
cs.description: Teplokrevní obratlovci rodící živá mláďata a kojící je mlékem.

en.name: Mammals
en.description: Warm-blooded vertebrates that give birth to live young and nurse them with milk.

en.name: Birds
en.description: Vertebrates with feathers, most of which are capable of flight.

cs.name: Plazi
cs.description: Studenokrevní obratlovci jako hadi, ještěrky a želvy.

en.name: Reptiles
en.description: Cold-blooded vertebrates like snakes, lizards, and turtles.
